description: A version node represents a specific version of a statute or section

is_current.description: Whether this is the current version

valid_from.description: Date from which version is valid

valid_to.description: Date until which version is valid

indexes: CREATE INDEX version_of_dates IF NOT EXISTS FOR ()-[r:VERSION_OF]-() ON (r.valid_from, r.valid_to)
CREATE INDEX version_of_current IF NOT EXISTS FOR ()-[r:VERSION_OF]-() ON (r.is_current)
